content.description: Sit start matched in a small, u-shaped crimp. Pop right to a small hold, and move up the arête/face.
content.location: Start about a foot or two right of the problem Silo.

content.description: Sit start the right arête, and then make a cool, long traverse left on the perfectly rounded lip with shaky feet. Really cool.
content.location: It is on a boulder near the swamp.

content.description: Start sitting on low slopers on the left arete. Traverse to the right on slopers, and slap for the big jug feature in the middle of the lip of the cave. It is hard.
content.location: This starts on the left side of the cave on the lowest part of the arete.

content.description: Sit start and move up the right arête, and then traverse all the way left on decent holds to top out.

Nocturnal Me is such a cool line that has great moves. Start at the back of the cave on a detached block, and swing your feet up in to get started. Climb out and up dangling from painful feet and jams until you get to the pretty bare topout. It's possible it's been climbed before. This is hard to grade, but I would like to see what others think.
content.location: On the Bat Cave Boulder, you can't miss it.

content.description: Stand start, move left with trick feet and a crux match, and top out.
content.location: Walk about 150-200 feet from the Bat Cave towards the highway to find this small block.

content.description: Stand start the lip and traverse all the way right to two small knobs, and top out straight above. This is a cool, new addition.
content.location: Start as for the Vanilla Ice Project, but head right across the slopey lip.

content.description: Stand start the steep protruding bulge with a left hand crimp and a right hand sloper. Move up and top out.
content.location: It is in the small alcove to the left of the Bat Cave.

content.description: Sit start the steep, short wall matched on the good hold, pop right to a sloper, move up, and top out.
content.location: It is just behind the Bat Cave.

content.description: Start either from the left or the right. Follow the horizonal crack across the top of the cave.
content.location: This goes over the large cave close to the highway.

content.description: Start on the big jug on the left side of Batcave Traverse. With a good left foot under the roof and a thin right foot on the face, pump big and grab just left of the pointed sloper.
content.location: This is in the middle of the cave.

content.description: Start on the good hold as a srcunch/ dangle start, pull up, make a tensiony move to a rail out left, and pull the top.
content.location: Use the same start, and do a different finish.

content.description: Crouch start about 6-7 feet left of the problem Silo, climb straight up, and top out.
content.location: This ascends the center of the boulder.

pathTokens: Cavalry Boulder Field aka Gymnasium aka Playground

content.description: Here are several more problems just beyond sight from the Valley and Alcove Boulders.
